title: Grilled fruit brochettes
ingredients: ['½ medium-sized ripe pineapple', '2 just ripe, firm bananas', '2 ripe but firm pears', '4 ripe but firm fresh figs', '2 ripe but firm peaches', 'juice of 1 lemon', '4 tsp sugar', 'cape gooseberries to decorate', 'Raspberry-orange coulis', '225 g (8 oz) raspberries', 'grated zest and juice of ½ orange', '1½ tbsp sugar, or to taste']
